amendment.description: To provide that Members of Congress may not receive pay after October 1 of any fiscal year in which Congress has not approved a concurrent resolution on the budget and passed the regular appropriations bills.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3832, under the order of 9/29/21, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 47. Record Vote Number: 396.

action.text: Amendment SA 3832 proposed by Senator Leahy for Senator Braun to Amendment SA 3830. (consideration: CR S6805-6806, S6809; text: CR S6805-6806) To provide that Members of Congress may not receive pay after October 1 of any fiscal year in which Congress has not approved a concurrent resolution on the budget and passed the regular appropriations bills.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3832 proposed by Senator Leahy for Senator Braun to Amendment SA 3830.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3832, under the order of 9/29/21, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 47. Record Vote Number: 396.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3832, under the order of 9/29/21, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 47. Record Vote Number: 396.
